languages.text: "Зря стараешься, чемпион — прислужники Инквизитора заглушили вокс-связь. К тому моменту, как ты выберешься на поверхность, его люди уже ускользнут с Ярмом. Но не переживай, ибо об этом исходе тебе уже поведал Предел рассвета. Сие не помешает твоему восхождению, а положит ему начало".

"You are wasting your effort, champion. The Inquisitor's minions have jammed the vox-transmitters. By the time you reach the surface, his people will have slipped away with the Yoke. But worry not, for this is an outcome the Edge of Daybreak has already told you about. It will be the beginning of your ascent, not an impediment."
languages.original_text: "Зря стараешься, чемпион — прислужники Инквизитора заглушили вокс-связь. К тому моменту, как ты выберешься на поверхность, его люди уже ускользнут с Ярмом. Но не переживай, ибо об этом исходе тебе уже поведал Предел рассвета. Сие не помешает твоему восхождению, а положит ему начало".

languages.text: “你这是在白费力气，勇士。那个审判官的爪牙干扰了音阵传输，等你抵达地表的时候，他的手下已经带着圣枷逃走了。不过，不用担心，因为这正是破晓锋刃预言的结果。这并不是障碍，而是你成功的第一步。”
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your effort, champion. The Inquisitor's minions have jammed the vox-transmitters. By the time you reach the surface, his people will have slipped away with the Yoke. But worry not, for this is an outcome the Edge of Daybreak has already told you about. It will be the beginning of your ascent, not an impediment."

traits.locale_text: “你这是在白费力气，勇士。那个审判官的爪牙干扰了音阵传输，等你抵达地表的时候，他的手下已经带着圣枷逃走了。不过，不用担心，因为这正是破晓锋刃预言的结果。这并不是障碍，而是你成功的第一步。”
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: "Ihr vergeudet Eure Mühen, Champion. Die Schergen des Inquisitors haben die Vox-Transmitter gestört. Bis Ihr die Oberfläche erreicht, sind seine Leute bereits mit dem Joch verschwunden. Doch keine Sorge, denn dies ist ein Ausgang, von dem der Rand des Tagesanbruchs Euch bereits berichtet hat. Er wird der Anfang Eures Aufstiegs sein, keine Behinderung."
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your effort, champion. The Inquisitor's minions have jammed the vox-transmitters. By the time you reach the surface, his people will have slipped away with the Yoke. But worry not, for this is an outcome the Edge of Daybreak has already told you about. It will be the beginning of your ascent, not an impediment."

Er wird der Anfang Eures Aufstiegs sein, keine Behinderung."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: «Te esfuerzas en vano, adalid. Los secuaces del Inquisidor han interferido los vocotransmisores. Para cuando llegues a la superficie, su gente ya se habrá escabullido con el Yugo. Pero no te preocupes, pues el Filo del Amanecer ya te ha revelado este desenlace. No constituirá un impedimento, sino que marcará el comienzo de tu ascensión».
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your effort, champion. The Inquisitor's minions have jammed the vox-transmitters. By the time you reach the surface, his people will have slipped away with the Yoke. But worry not, for this is an outcome the Edge of Daybreak has already told you about. It will be the beginning of your ascent, not an impediment."

traits.locale_text: «Te esfuerzas en vano, adalid. Los secuaces del Inquisidor han interferido los vocotransmisores. Para cuando llegues a la superficie, su gente ya se habrá escabullido con el Yugo. Pero no te preocupes, pues el Filo del Amanecer ya te ha revelado este desenlace. No constituirá un impedimento, sino que marcará el comienzo de tu ascensión».
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: « Vous perdez votre temps, {mf|champion|championne}. Les sbires de l'inquisiteur ont brouillé les transmetteurs-vox. Le temps que vous retourniez à la surface, ses hommes auront déjà disparu avec le Joug. Mais ne vous inquiétez pas, la Lame de l'Aube vous a déjà fait part de cette issue. Celle-ci marquera le début de votre ascension ; elle ne vous gênera en rien. »
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your effort, champion. The Inquisitor's minions have jammed the vox-transmitters. By the time you reach the surface, his people will have slipped away with the Yoke. But worry not, for this is an outcome the Edge of Daybreak has already told you about. It will be the beginning of your ascent, not an impediment."

traits.locale_text: « Vous perdez votre temps, {mf|champion|championne}. Les sbires de l'inquisiteur ont brouillé les transmetteurs-vox. Le temps que vous retourniez à la surface, ses hommes auront déjà disparu avec le Joug. Mais ne vous inquiétez pas, la Lame de l'Aube vous a déjà fait part de cette issue. Celle-ci marquera le début de votre ascension ; elle ne vous gênera en rien. »
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: 「無駄な努力だ、王者よ。異端審問官の手下がヴォクス・トランスミッターを妨害している。お前が地上に着くころには、彼の手下はヨークと一緒に逃げ出しているだろう。だが、心配はいらない。これは暁の刃がすでにお前に伝えている結果だ。それはお前の昇天の始まりであり、障害にはならない」
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your effort, champion. The Inquisitor's minions have jammed the vox-transmitters. By the time you reach the surface, his people will have slipped away with the Yoke. But worry not, for this is an outcome the Edge of Daybreak has already told you about. It will be the beginning of your ascent, not an impediment."

traits.locale_text: 「無駄な努力だ、王者よ。異端審問官の手下がヴォクス・トランスミッターを妨害している。お前が地上に着くころには、彼の手下はヨークと一緒に逃げ出しているだろう。だが、心配はいらない。これは暁の刃がすでにお前に伝えている結果だ。それはお前の昇天の始まりであり、障害にはならない」
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: "Çabanı boşa harcıyorsun müdafi. Engizisyoncu'nun avaneleri, voks vericilerini bozdu. Sen yüzeye ulaşana dek adamları, Boyunduruk'la kaçmış olacak. Ancak endişelenme, Tan Vakti'nin sana söylemiş olduğu sonuç bu. Yükselişinin başlangıcı olacak, sana ket vurmayacak."
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your effort, champion. The Inquisitor's minions have jammed the vox-transmitters. By the time you reach the surface, his people will have slipped away with the Yoke. But worry not, for this is an outcome the Edge of Daybreak has already told you about. It will be the beginning of your ascent, not an impediment."
